articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola agrees a one-year contract extension to take his stay at the club to 10 seasons.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City manager agrees one-year contract extension

articles.description: Rafael Nadal loses in what might prove to be the final match of his career as Davis Cup hosts Spain fall behind against the Netherlands.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal: Retiring superstar loses for Spain at farewell Davis Cup

articles.description: As the Pep Guardiola contract news breaks, BBC Sport asks how does he compare to some other managerial legends?
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: How does Man City manager compare to other legendary bosses?

articles.description: The group stage for the new-look Nations League is over, so what next for the Home Nations and who is through to the quarter-finals?
articles.title: Nations League: What next as group stage ends and how is World Cup affected?

articles.description: Craig Bellamy hopes his successful start as Wales head coach has proved he is not the “lunatic” some expected him to be.
articles.title: Craig Bellamy: 'I'm not a lunatic' says Wales boss after Nations League win

articles.description: Liverpool midfielder Dominik Szoboszlai scores a Panenka penalty in the 99th minute of stoppage time as Hungary grab a late equaliser to deny Germany.
articles.title: Dominik Szoboszlai's late Panenka penalty for Hungary denies Germany in Nations League

articles.description: Great Britain missing out on a first Billie Jean King Cup final for 43 years "stings", but Katie Boulter believes the team are close to ending their wait for glory.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup: Great Britain missing out on final 'stings', says Katie Boulter

articles.description: Sporting striker Viktor Gyokeres scores four goals and Tottenham forward Dejan Kulusevski gets two as Sweden crush Azerbaijan.
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres scores four as Sweden crush Azerbaijan in Nations League

articles.description: Chelsea condemn the "unacceptable and hateful homophobic comments" aimed at Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis after the couple said they are expecting a baby.
articles.title: Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis baby: Chelsea condemn 'hateful and homophobic comments'

articles.description: Roger Federer says Rafael Nadal "made the whole tennis world proud" during his "epic career" before the Spaniard's retirement.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal retires: Roger Federer pays tribute to Spaniard for 'epic career'
